entry.title: WIND WARNING , Langley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:45 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 12.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 9.4°C
Wind: SSE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 near the water early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 early this morning then diminishing to 20 early this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near the water. Low 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
